post_text:
Dear Friends,
The next week starts a new chapter in public education. There is a huge learning curve that students and teachers will be navigating together.
As we embark on this thing called ‚ÄúDistance Learning,‚Äù I am asking you to refrain from publicly scrutinizing your children‚Äôs teachers/schools/district for the way they are teaching or the lessons they are assigning.
Please offer grace to your child‚Äôs teacher and other school personnel. I promise that educating your children is still our #1 priority. ‚ù§Ô∏è
They are about to navigate unchartered waters with little, to no prep time. This is a crisis, not a time to be playing armchair quarterback. They love our kids and will be doing their absolute best!
ü§çüíªüìùüìåüìéüñäüììüìöüßÆ‚ûóüñç‚ûï

And fellow educators, YOU‚ÄôVE GOT THIS! WE‚ÄôVE GOT THIS! I believe in you! -author of post unknown, but sentiments shared by many!
text:
Dear Friends,
The next week starts a new chapter in public education. There is a huge learning curve that students and teachers will be navigating together.
As we embark on this thing called ‚ÄúDistance Learning,‚Äù I am asking you to refrain from publicly scrutinizing your children‚Äôs teachers/schools/district for the way they are teaching or the lessons they are assigning.
Please offer grace to your child‚Äôs teacher and other school personnel. I promise that educating your children is still our #1 priority. ‚ù§Ô∏è
They are about to navigate unchartered waters with little, to no prep time. This is a crisis, not a time to be playing armchair quarterback. They love our kids and will be doing their absolute best!
ü§çüíªüìùüìåüìéüñäüììüìöüßÆ‚ûóüñç‚ûï

And fellow educators, YOU‚ÄôVE GOT THIS! WE‚ÄôVE GOT THIS! I believe in you! -author of post unknown, but sentiments shared by many!

We are #HopeStrong!

post_text: Today, about 20 student athletes from Monte Vista participated in the Lemon Classic Track Meet at SMHS. Students from K to 6th ran the 100, 200, 800, and mile. In addition, some won 1st in the shot put and placed very well in the long jump. This was the first event for the team and the season has about 3 more meets. Is your child interested? Practices are Mondays at 3 and Saturday mornings at 9:00. There is NO fee to participate on the team. Mr. Regan is the coach and can be emailed for more information. (Thanks for the adorable photo, Robert Regan!)
text: Today, about 20 student athletes from Monte Vista participated in the Lemon Classic Track Meet at SMHS. Students from K to 6th ran the 100, 200, 800, and mile. In addition, some won 1st in the shot put and placed very well in the long jump. This was the first event for the team and the season has about 3 more meets. Is your child interested? Practices are Mondays at 3 and Saturday mornings at 9:00. There is NO fee to participate on the team. Mr. Regan is the coach and can be emailed for more information. post_text: UCSB Materials Science Lab sent Dr. Pak and 4 graduate students to Vieja Valley to guide the 5th graders through an independent build of a 60 Carbon Molecule called "Bucky Balls". Specifically, a buckyball is a molecule called Buckminsterfullerene. Composed of 60 carbon atoms formed in the shape of a hollow ball, buckyballs have, as yet, little practical use, although they do make up nanotubes, which have some uses. The story of buckyballs begins in 1985 in the laboratory of British astronomer Harold Kroto. (Thank you Mr. Evans for the pics!)
text: UCSB Materials Science Lab sent Dr. Pak and 4 graduate students to Vieja Valley to guide the 5th graders through an independent build of a 60 Carbon Molecule called "Bucky Balls". Specifically, a buckyball is a molecule called Buckminsterfullerene. Composed of 60 carbon atoms formed in the shape of a hollow ball, buckyballs have, as yet, little practical use, although they do make up nanotubes, which have some uses. The story of buckyballs begins in 1985 in the laboratory of British astronomer Harold Kroto. (Thank you Mr. Evans for the pics!)
